committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation

official_title: To authorize conveyance of 2 decommissioned Coast Guard vessels to Canvasback Mission, Inc., for use for provision of medical services.

summary.text: Directs the Commandant of the Coast Guard to convey all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to two specified decommissioned vessels to Canvasback Mission, Inc., in Oregon, under specified conditions.

titles.title: To authorize conveyance of 2 decommissioned Coast Guard vessels to Canvasback Mission, Inc., for use for provision of medical services.
